text: William Tayloe Murphy Jr. (January 9, 1933 â€“ September 15, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates between 1982 and 2000. Murphy Jr. was Secretary of Natural Resources under Governor Mark Warner from 2002 until 2006. Murphy Jr. was born in Richmond County, Virginia. Murphy Jr. died on September 15, 2021 at the age of 88.Virginia Environmental Leader W.
